title: Greek typeface used in a encyclopedia (RGG4)
content:
I'm looking for a greek typeface taken from RGG4 (Religion in Geschichte und Gegenwart, 4th edition). I thought it's Plantagenet from Tiro Fonts, but it doesn't match exactly. Any ideas? Thank you.
